author: @arielleung3917
text: Merry Christmas, Alex! Thank you for your honest opinions. I really appreciate it. For some evil reasons, I worked as entry-level data roles in finance, marketing, research, and manufacturing for 5 years, after obtaining BS in mathematics. Then I became the only "data scientist" in the R&D team of an IT startup, modelling and mining big data in collaboration with software developers and telecommunications engineers. I realize data scientist is vaguely defined and definitely not an entry-level job, so I'm doing a MS in computer science to fill the technical gap. Could you please give me some advice on how to shape my experience on resume, since I think the path from data analyst to data scientist fits me best? Thanks again!
